scripts.logs:docker: mkdir -p logs/docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml logs --no-log-prefix postgres > logs/docker/postgres.log 2>&1 && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml logs --no-log-prefix redis > logs/docker/redis.log 2>&1 && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml logs --no-log-prefix localstack > logs/docker/localstack.log 2>&1 && echo 'Docker logs captured to logs/docker/'
scripts.logs:clear: rm -rf logs/ && echo 'All log files cleared'
